mapper.select: select ab_code as abCode, ab_id as abId, ab_pw as abPw ,ab_name as abName,ab_birth as abBirth,ab_gender as abGender, ac_bankname as acBankName, ac_account as acAccount from ab inner join ac on ac.ac_abcode = ab.ab_code where ab.ab_code = #{abCode} group by ab.ab_code,ab.ab_id,ab.ab_pw,ab.ab_name,ab.ab_birth,ab.ab_gender,ac.ac_bankname,ac.ac_account
mapper.update: update AB set AB_NAME = #{abName} where AB_CODE =#{abCode}
update AC set AC_BANKNAME =#{acBankName},AC_ACCOUNT=#{acAccount} where AC_ABCODE =#{abCode} and AC_ACCOUNT=#{acAccount}
update AB set AB_PW =#{abPw} where AB_CODE =#{abCode}
